name: Crop++
description:
You're a 🌻Sunflower🌻 farmer!

The more sunflowers you harvest, the more profit! And who doesn't like profit?
Simply water the crops, and harvest when they're grown!

But, your farm is expanding. Quite rapidly, too. With the help of several upgrades, you won't have to water and harvest every single plant. But how long can you keep up with the ever growing farm?
